p: In our analysis, we included four categories of data, viz., (i) state-level, time-series data of energy demand in the residential and commercial sectors, (ii) fractions of total end-use energy needed for space cooling, heating and water heating for the residential households and commercial buildings, (iii) historical climate data for the state of Indiana, and (iv) statistically downscaled projections of future climate data for the state. Below, we will briefly discuss each of these categories of data.
